summary: Email correspondence between Assistant United States Attorney Maurene Comey and others regarding a request for FBI photos and measurements from the Special Housing Unit (SHU) where Jeffrey Epstein was held, and the logistics of obtaining a hard drive for evidence transfer.

persons.name: Maurene Comey
persons.context: Appears as the sender/recipient in email correspondence requesting FBI photos and measurements from the SHU where Jeffrey Epstein was held, and coordinating evidence transfer logistics.

events.title: Request for SHU Photos and Measurements
events.description: Assistant United States Attorney Maurene Comey requests FBI photos of the Special Housing Unit (SHU) and the measurement of steps from Jeffrey Epstein's cell to the guard desk.

keyFacts: FBI had taken photos of the Special Housing Unit (SHU) where Jeffrey Epstein was held.
FBI had measured the number of steps from Epstein's cell to the guard desk.
A request was made for a 100GB hard drive to facilitate the download of material by FBI CART (Computer Analysis and Response Team).
The correspondence involves coordination between legal and IT personnel for evidence collection.
The document is dated September 18, 2019, after Epstein's death in August 2019, indicating ongoing investigation into his jail conditions.
